channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins chosen-views-tabbar Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins chosen-views-tabbar Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2269|2024-08-04T07:01:41.228Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20chosen-views-tabbar%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins chosen-views-tabbar Plugin 1.2 and earlier does not escape view names in the dropdown to select views, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with the ability to configure views.
